description.p: You create a loop with your fingers and peer through it, magically magnifying your sight. While concentrating, anything you can see viewed through the loop appears twice as large.
The spell’s magnification increases to four times at 5th level, eight times at 11th level, and sixteen times at 17th level.

Spectral chains lash out from you. Each creature of your choice in a 15-foot emanation originating from you must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 2d4 force damage and is pulled 10 feet closer to you. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is not pulled.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 2d4 for each slot level above 1st.

You seed hostility in the hearts of others toward one unfortunate soul. Choose a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, all other creatures regard the target as hostile.
This effect does not compel aggression, but they perceive the target as an enemy and are unlikely to offer it aid or cooperation.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can repeat its saving throw againt this spell, ending the effect on a success.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.
